org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.api

Interface LoginApi


  • public interface LoginApi
    The login REST API.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void login(<any> callback)
      Get the different login flows supported by the server.
      void login(LoginParams loginParams, <any> callback)
      Pass params to the server for the current login phase.
      void logout(<any> callback)
      Invalidate the access token, so that it can no longer be used for authorization.
      void register(RegistrationParams params, <any> callback)
      Try to create an account

    • Method Detail

        Get the different login flows supported by the server.

        Pass params to the server for the current login phase.
        Parameters:
        loginParams - the login parameters
        callback - the asynchronous callback called with the response

      • logout

        void logout(<any> callback)
        Invalidate the access token, so that it can no longer be used for authorization.
        Parameters:
        callback - the asynchronous callback called with the response
